title: How To Waste $340 on Amazon!
description: Check out the LG XBOOM GO!  I bought EVERY product on Amazon:  Last episode of MYSTERY TECH:   Sunnytech Solar Spinner on Amazon:  Automatic Toy Drone on Amazon:  Mutrics GB-30 Gaming Glasses:  Funku Pop Pikachu on Amazon:  Polar Pen on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  Our second channel @thisis!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:    #XBOOMGo #LGBluetoothspeaker #BestBluetoothspeaker
